chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
None

Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit s0 s1) c = Some (pl_produit p0 p1)

Premises:
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
ad = N : Set
s_produit = fix s_produit (s0 s1 : state) {struct s1} : state := match s0 with | @M0 _ => match s1 with | @M0 _ | _ => M0 prec_list end | @M1 _ a0 p0 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M1 prec_list a1 p1) | @M2 _ s10 s11 => s_produit_l a0 p0 (M2 prec_list s10 s11) end | @M2 _ s00 s01 => match s1 with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a1 p1 => s_produit_r a1 p1 (M2 prec_list s00 s01
state = Map prec_list : Set
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop

sproductl_0_def = fun s : state => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r0 r1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some r1 -> MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p s) c = Some (pl_produit r0 r1) : state -> Prop

prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
invar_1_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state) (p : prec_list), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some p -> rec_list_terms d p t n = true -> rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true

sproductl_1_0 = fun (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list) (H : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some r) => let H0 : Some r = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1 := match H in (_ = y) return (y = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1) with | eq_refl => fun H0 : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some r => (fun H1 : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_l...
sproductr_1_0 = fun (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (c : ad) (r : prec_list) (H : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some r) => let H0 : Some r = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1 := match H in (_ = y) return (y = Some r -> exists r0 r1 : prec_list, MapGet prec_list (M1 prec_list a p) c = Some r0 /\ MapGet prec_list (M0 prec_list) c = Some r1) with | eq_refl => fun H0 : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r a p (M0 prec_list)) c = Some r => (fun H1 : MapGet prec_list (s_produit_r...
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
semantic_equiv_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list) (e : MapGet prec_list s c = Some l) (l0 : liste_reconnait d l tl), pre_reconnait d l tl l0 -> st_reconnait d s (app c tl) (rec_st d s c tl l e l0)
s_produit_l = fix s_produit_l (a : ad) (p : prec_list) (s : state) {struct s} : state := match s with | @M0 _ => M0 prec_list | @M1 _ a' p' => if (a =? a')%N then M1 prec_list a (pl_produit p p') else M0 prec_list | @M2 _ s0 s1 => match a with | 0%N => M2 prec_list (s_produit_l 0%N p s0) (M0 prec_list) | N.pos (q'~1)%positive => M2 prec_list (M0 prec_list) (s_produit_l (N.pos q') p s1) | N.pos (q'~0)%positive => M2 prec_list (s_produit_l (N.pos q') p s0) (M0 prec_list) | 1%N => M2 prec_list (M0 prec_list) (...

pl_path_product = fix pl_path_product (p0 p1 : pl_path) {struct p1} : pl_path := match p0 with | pl_path_nil => match p1 with | pl_path_nil | _ => pl_path_nil end | pl_path_cons a0 b0 => match p1 with | pl_path_nil => pl_path_nil | pl_path_cons a1 b1 => pl_path_cons (iad_conv a0 a1) (pl_path_product b0 b1) end end : pl_path -> pl_path -> pl_path
in_M2_disj : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (m0 m1 : Map A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M2 A m0 m1) c = Some a) -> (exists c : ad, MapGet A m0 c = Some a) \/ (exists c : ad, MapGet A m1 c = Some a)

```coq
Proof.
intros s0 s1 c p0 p1 Hget0 Hget1.
rewrite <- (sproductl_0 a p0 s0 c r0 r1 Hget0 Hget1) in Hget1.
rewrite <- (sproductr_0 a p1 s1 c r0 r1 Hget1 Hget0) in Hget0.
apply (sproductl_0_def s0).
assumption.
assumption.
apply (sproductr_0_def s1).
assumption.
assumption.
Qed.

original: intros s0 s1 c p0 p1 Hget0 Hget1. rewrite <- (sproductl_0 a p0 s0 c r0 r1 Hget0 Hget1) in Hget1. rewrite <- (sproductr_0 a p1 s1 c r0 r1 Hget1 Hget0) in Hget0. apply (sproductl_0_def s0). auto. auto. apply (sproductr_0_def s1). auto. auto.
